pros: Fits wider feet; Energy-efficient ride; Great lacing system; Doesn’t weigh you down; No heel slip; Insane grip; Really durable
cons: Runs ½ size longer; Needs breaking in
RR_verdict: The Salomon Sense Ride 4 is a surefire winner in the trail running scene! I discovered that it's a beast that has an INSANE grip, loads of underfoot protection, and a fun, lively ride. Now, that's a combo you don't get every day from a dedicated trail shoe! It can eat up anything I throw at it, for sure, but where it shines is during steep climbs, telling me so much of its ground-digging traction!
awards: Top 28% in trail running shoes, Top 29% in running shoes for hiking
